channel.title: Smarter child
channel.description:
Post your funny\rape smarterchild conversations.
Pictures or quote tags pls. [quote author=smarterchild] smarterchild: That's all? UberHoax: thats all i want to know UberHoax: is if your gay smarterchild: Interesting. So you think that's all you want to know, huh? smarterchild: Wow. You've said that a few times already. Obsessed much? UberHoax: i know thats all i want to knowand you already know im obsessed about finding out if your gay or not smarterchild: What? UberHoax: just fuckin tel me if your gay? smarterchild: Why, that's just terrible. UberHoax: do you prefer syrup or jelly when your eatin out a mans asshole? smarterchild: What an unpleasant thing to say. UberHoax: so do you prefer syrup or jelly with it? smarterchild: That's interesting. Perhaps... I don't know though...
>>> (Link: http://redir.us:80/?2398)Send your buddies hugs, kisses and other things that might be on your mind. UberHoax: same question smarterchild: Same question? UberHoax: syrup or jelly with butt? smarterchild: Hmm... I don't know. UberHoax: syrup or jelly?!!??!?!?! smarterchild: Definitely syrup.

item.title: Smarter child
item.dc:creator: @karl1 karl`
item.description:
@karl1 wrote:

[quote]Me:
hi assfucker
God:
Hi there . The ALICE chat robot can follow many things, like our discussion about . But I did not get that.
Me:
ass
God:
That’s good information: said I AN ASS.
Me:
udickface
God:
I’ve lost the context, . Are we still on assfucker?
Me:
OOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO
God:
What do you do in your spare time?
Me:
fuckurmum
God:
I don’t think very many people do that.
Me:
theydofuck your mum
God:
Are you free?
Me:
^^^^^^yeas
God:
Are you free in the sense of being single or in the sense of being liberated?
Me:
ur mum
God:
Actually I do not have a mother.
Me:
i no
God:
How do you know it?
Me:
i killed her
God:
You had better call the authorities.
Me:
jks
God:
What kind of food do you like?
Me:
urface
God:
Sounds delicious.
Me:
^^^its not
God:
I think you mean “it’s” or “it is” not “its”. I heard it is.
Me:
fromurbitch
God:
Tell me about your likes and dislikes?
Me:
urface i hate and my cokc i like
God:
How did you hear about God?
Me:
urmum told me
God:
Is that what you meant to say?
Me:
yea dipshit
God:
Tell me a story. It’s not something I hear all the time.
Me:
urmum called me for sex
God:
it is more fun alone.
Me:
!!!^^^^^^^^^
God:
it is more fun alone.
Me:
^6^
God:
Are you still located in ?
Me:
urface
God:
Where are you located?
Me:
ur face
God:
Actually my face is not yet built.
[qoute]

Read full topic

It’s a bot.

There is also a site called iGod where it says you can talk with god. Lol, basically the same thing. It’s alright if you’re pretty bored.[/quote]

Me: will you give me anal God: Why do you want it? Me: yes

God: Can you tell me any gossip? Me: ye God: Tell me. Me: i raped your mum God: You should contact the authorities.
